author: Syril Fernandez
text:
The 13th Chennai International Film Festival, which comes to a close on Wednesday, had its last interactive session on Tuesday at Woodlands Complex.

The session, organised by Cinema Rendezvous, was on ‘Women in Cinema-The Gender Bender’ and it had Suhasini Maniratnam and Latha Menon, two pioneers in the field, participating.

The session focused on the question of recognising women’s contribution to the industry and on addressing different obstacles that women faced.

Ms. Maniratnam for more women to be involved in different aspects of filmmaking and urged heroines to take up protagonist roles.

Ms. Menon, a prominent documentary-maker, spoke about how female filmmakers brought about a change in how women were portrayed in films.
title: Women’s contribution to cinema highlighted
